intro: ^What do you know about the drowning incident?
^The lifeguard told me to talk to you.
soft: ^Chef: Oh, yeah. The lifeguard and I are good friends.
^He said to talk to you about the drowning incident.
why: ^Chef: Why do you want to know?
begin_story: ^Chef: Oh. Well, what happened was honestly one of the worst things to happen in my life. I remember how your mom had threatened us. But I'm sure the lifeguard told you all about that.
story: ^Chef: Truth is...I've always been scared of your mom.
story2: ^Chef: She was blackmailing me for other stuff...stuff I can't go into the details about. But she was just trying to get me to stay working at the hotel.
story3: ^Chef: Truth is, I really want to open my own restaurant. It's always been my dream.
story4: ^Chef: Maybe I will finally get the chance now.
story5: ^Chef: Oh, I am so sorry! I can see how that came off.
ending: ^Chef: Uh, I should get going. Seeya around.
